languages.text: Селестиум Обсерваторум вздымается над палубой. Дух древнего механизма умолк навеки, но на его остове филигранно выгравирована надпись: "Пытливый взор пронзает мрак, где всходят лжи ростки, и в пепел обращает скверну".

The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."
languages.original_text: Селестиум Обсерваторум вздымается над палубой. Дух древнего механизма умолк навеки, но на его остове филигранно выгравирована надпись: "Пытливый взор пронзает мрак, где всходят лжи ростки, и в пепел обращает скверну".

traits.locale_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

languages.text: L'imposant Celestium Observatorum surplombe le pont. Bien que l'esprit de ce mécanisme ancien se soit tu à jamais, les mots finement gravés sur son châssis continuent d'inspirer ceux qui les lisent : « Un regard perçant fend les ténèbres trompeuses et réduit en cendres toute corruption. »
languages.original_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

traits.locale_text: L'imposant Celestium Observatorum surplombe le pont. Bien que l'esprit de ce mécanisme ancien se soit tu à jamais, les mots finement gravés sur son châssis continuent d'inspirer ceux qui les lisent : « Un regard perçant fend les ténèbres trompeuses et réduit en cendres toute corruption. »

languages.text: Das Celestium Observatorum ragt über dem Deck empor. Der Geist dieses uralten Mechanismus ist zwar für immer verstummt, doch die Worte, die in filigraner Schrift auf sein Gehäuse geschrieben wurden, können noch immer als Quell der Entschlossenheit dienen: "Ein scharfer Blick zerreißt die Dunkelheit, aus der Täuschung erwächst, und verwandelt sämtliche Verderbnis in Asche."
languages.original_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

traits.locale_text: Das Celestium Observatorum ragt über dem Deck empor. Der Geist dieses uralten Mechanismus ist zwar für immer verstummt, doch die Worte, die in filigraner Schrift auf sein Gehäuse geschrieben wurden, können noch immer als Quell der Entschlossenheit dienen: "Ein scharfer Blick zerreißt die Dunkelheit, aus der Täuschung erwächst, und verwandelt sämtliche Verderbnis in Asche."

languages.text: El Celestium Observatorum se yergue sobre la cubierta. Aunque el espíritu de este antiguo mecanismo ha callado para siempre, las palabras inscritas en su exterior siguen sirviendo de inspiración: «Una mirada penetrante atraviesa la oscuridad y sus engaños, reduciendo toda corrupción a cenizas».
languages.original_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

traits.locale_text: El Celestium Observatorum se yergue sobre la cubierta. Aunque el espíritu de este antiguo mecanismo ha callado para siempre, las palabras inscritas en su exterior siguen sirviendo de inspiración: «Una mirada penetrante atraviesa la oscuridad y sus engaños, reduciendo toda corrupción a cenizas».

languages.text: セレスティウム天文台が、デッキの上にドンとそびえ立っている。この古代機械の精霊はずっと沈黙したままだが、そのフレームに細かく刻まれた言葉は、今でも決意の生まれた場所として存在している。「鋭い視線が嘘ばかりの闇を切り裂き、すべての腐敗を灰に帰す」。
languages.original_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

traits.locale_text: セレスティウム天文台が、デッキの上にドンとそびえ立っている。この古代機械の精霊はずっと沈黙したままだが、そのフレームに細かく刻まれた言葉は、今でも決意の生まれた場所として存在している。「鋭い視線が嘘ばかりの闇を切り裂き、すべての腐敗を灰に帰す」。

languages.text: 甲板上安装着天体观测台。尽管这台古老机器的机魂已经彻底陷入了沉寂，但机器外壳上铭刻的铭文依然可以鼓舞士气，振奋精神。上面写着：“愿敏锐的目光驱散充满欺骗的黑暗，将一切腐化灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."

traits.locale_text: 甲板上安装着天体观测台。尽管这台古老机器的机魂已经彻底陷入了沉寂，但机器外壳上铭刻的铭文依然可以鼓舞士气，振奋精神。上面写着：“愿敏锐的目光驱散充满欺骗的黑暗，将一切腐化灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text: Celestium Observatorum, köprü üzerinde yükseliyor. Bu kadim mekanizmanın ruhu sonsuza dek sessizliğe bürünmüş olsa da üzerine kazınmış olan "Keskin bir bakış, egemen karanlığı yarıp geçer ve tüm yozlaşmanın kökünü kazır." ifadesi, okuyanlara esin kaynağı olmayı sürdürüyor.
languages.original_text: The Celestium Observatorum looms over the deck. While the spirit of this ancient mechanism has gone silent forever, the words intricately inscribed on its frame can still serve as a source of resolve: "A keen gaze sunders the darkness abloom with deceit and reduces all corruption to ash."
